timeline.bodyText:
showLoadingMessage() is then set to View.GONE.
Can you directly set this to "gone" in xml, and we can skip this then?
timeline.author: tobiasKaminsky

replies.bodyText: No, the empty list view is part of the included layout so this would then impact any screen that includes the empty list file (!)
replies.author: AndyScherzinger

timeline.bodyText:
setProgressIndicatorState sets "isLoadingActive".
This is needed for scroll listener, so we need setProgressIndicatorState to be called.
timeline.author: tobiasKaminsky

replies.bodyText: How would this need to change? setting isLoading is fine while setRefreshing() shall not be called here (else you have a mini spinner and a shimmer element!
replies.author: AndyScherzinger
